original_text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father: and ye do that which ye have seen with your father.
korean_text: 나는 내 아버지에게서 본 것을 말하고 너희는 너희 아비에게서 들은 것을 행하느니라

sentences.original_text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 아버지와 함께 본 것을 말하노라

sentences.original_text: and ye do that which ye have seen with your father
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 너희 아버지와 함께 본 것을 행하느니라
